EmailTemplate.subject: RnR: Recognition for {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Project__c} project
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Team Member,
We are thrilled to share some fantastic news with the entire team and inform you that {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Resource__c} has received a {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Types_of_Recognition__c} for their outstanding contributions as part of our {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Project__c} project.
{!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Resource__c} has consistently demonstrated exceptional dedication, hard work, and expertise, and their efforts have not gone unnoticed and thus {!Reward_And_Recognition__c.Recognization_By__c} has given this recognition.
Please join us in extending our heartfelt congratulations and take pride in this shared success.! Let's continue working together to achieve more milestones and successes as a team.
Best Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
